DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether implement rehabilitation program improve post-operative time pain free living breast augmentation .
DOC.criteria: woman undergo endoscopic transaxillary subpectoral breast augmentation woman age 18 year woman BMI 1827 woman underwent previous breast reconstruction ( cosmetic therapeutic ) woman underwent previous chest surgery woman previous chest trauma woman underwent previous shoulder/arm surgery woman previous shoulder/arm injury woman smoke woman Immunocompromised
